data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Reeves, Will K., Adler, Peter H., Grogan, William L., Super, Paul E. (2004): Hematophagous and Parasitic Diptera (Insecta) in the Great Smoky Mountains National Park, USA. Zootaxa 483: 1-44, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.157582
